channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Welcome to the Suck
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Bearish sentiment just hit an extreme. According to the latest AAII survey, 62% of investors feel bearish—nearly triple the num...

item.title: The Truth Behind Trump’s Tariff Tactics
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! As I write this, S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 futures are deep in the red—down 3.6% and 3.9%, respectively. They’ve clawed back a bit...

item.title: What the 2025 Selloff Actually Reminds Me Of
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! 2025 feels a lot like 2018—a sharp market pullback fueled by tariff uncertainty, a stubborn Fed, and a media eager to amplify t...
